snippet: Two conservative former members of the State House who had an extramarital affair and tried to conceal it will both run for their old seats.
lead_paragraph: Two conservative former members of the State House who had an extramarital affair and tried to conceal it will both run for their old seats.

headline.main: Michigan: After Sex Scandal, Republicans Seek Old Seats
headline.print_headline: Michigan: After Sex Scandal, Republicans Seek Old Seats
